subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Tour de France officials said the ban on race radios — for stages 10 and 13 — would force riders to think for themselves without any instructions from race directors.
snippet: Tour de France officials said the ban on race radios — for stages 10 and 13 — would force riders to think for themselves without any instructions from race directors.
